input.sentences: the group got together to have drinks .
they tried each other 's to see if they were better .
their favorite beer was being sold at the bar so they had one .
the guys had a great time .
output.sentences: Todd ordered a bunch of drinks for random girls.
One of the girls lips got dry from the drinks, so she used Todd's face to moisten them.
She then hugged Todd, and now his girlfriend is gonna be super mad that he got caught.
The girlfriend wasn't mad. She sold more beer to her favorite new friend now.
Then the girls left and it was time for the guys to party together.
